entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
